blogPost.excerpt: Plot combines your calendar, health and finances to give you a personalized overview of your life so you can manage what’s important. By integrating with your Apple Calendar and Health apps with your finances, Plot pulls-in and organizes your information.
blogPost.body: Plot combines your calendar, health and finances to give you a personalized overview of your life so you can manage what’s important. By integrating with your Apple Calendar and Health apps with your finances, Plot pulls-in and organizes your information.
blogPost.title: Plot 2.0 - a calendar, health and personal finance app all in one
blogPost.author: Cory McHattie

localize.description: Plot结合了你的日历、健康和财务，给你一个个性化的生活概览，让你可以管理重要的事情。通过整合你的Apple日历和健康应用程序与你的财务状况，Plot将你的信息拉进并组织起来。
localize.tagline: 一款集日历、健康和个人理财于一身的应用。

localize.description: Plot結合了你的日曆、健康和財務，給你一個個性化的生活概覽，讓你可以管理重要的事情。通過整合你的Apple日曆和健康應用程序與你的財務狀況，Plot將你的信息拉進並組織起來。
localize.tagline: 一款集日曆、健康和個人理財於一身的應用。

previous.excerpt: SocialProofed is the easy way to embed Instagram feeds, Facebook reviews, and Google testimonials on your website...in just 60 seconds!
previous.title: SocialProofed - Make commerce a social experience.

localize.description: SocialProofed是在您的网站上嵌入Instagram feeds、Facebook评论和谷歌推荐的简单方法......只需60秒！您只需在您的网站上嵌入Instagram feeds、Facebook评论和谷歌推荐。
localize.tagline: 让商业成为一种社交体验。

localize.description: SocialProofed是在您的網站上嵌入Instagram feeds、Facebook評論和谷歌推薦的簡單方法......只需60秒！您只需在您的網站上嵌入Instagram feeds、Facebook評論和谷歌推薦。
localize.tagline: 讓商業成爲一種社交體驗。

next.excerpt: This is a website with alcohol education and solutions, in partnership with over two dozen other independent brands who are working to raise the standards of the alcohol industry.
next.title: Know Your Alcohol  - Demystifying the alcohol industry (from Haus and Good Vodka)

localize.description: 这是一个提供酒精教育和解决方案的网站，与其他二十多个独立品牌合作，他们正在努力提高酒精行业的标准。
localize.tagline: 解读酒类行业（摘自豪斯和好伏特加）。

localize.description: 這是一個提供酒精教育和解決方案的網站，與其他二十多個獨立品牌合作，他們正在努力提高酒精行業的標準。
localize.tagline: 解讀酒類行業（摘自豪斯和好伏特加）。
